# categoryTokens

**Instance Property**

Tokens that represent categories selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
var categoryTokens: Set<ActivityCategoryToken>
```

## Accessing Selected Categories

- **categories**: A set of category instances selected by the user.

items.description: A set of category instances selected by the user.
items.name: categories
